title: Ethyl acetate as an acetyl source and solvent for acetylation of alcohols by KOH
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,12574-12579
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08717D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiaodan Wang, Huilin Sun, Yao Cheng, Wenfei Yang, Xinmei Wang, Liting Xiong, Yiying Li, Jinhui Wang, Chunli Gan, Chunguang Lin, Huanjun Xu
A mild, efficient and convenient procedure for the acetylation of alcohols with EtOAc as acetyl source and solvent mediated by KOH was reported.
